content: Oh, wow! Thanks for the flashback to one of my favorite childhood movies. I must have watched this 10 times back in the day, and I love everything about it — especially the way John Wood’s bishop goes flying backwards when he gets pinioned to the wall. Ha! A fate well-deserved! Couldn’t agree more about Michelle Pfeiffer, either. I wanted to look just like her after I saw this movie. So beautiful.
